nodes.text: DG-11 Excavation Droid was a droid model in use during the Galactic War. White Maw pirate captain Ayor-v9 used several DG-11 Excavation Droids for protection of his base in the tunnels of Hoth and considered them to be "his family".
DG-11 Excavation Droids appear in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Bounty Hunter class mission on Hoth.
